text: @realDonaldTrump Please do not give Coronavirus orphan drug status. I have the  rare disease  Trigeminal Neuralgia the most painful disease known to mankind. We need a cure! We suffer excrusiating pain 24/7. Put the money on real rare diseases. Add the disease to the Compassionate Allowance List.
